com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.ui.widget

Class ImageLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
        • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
          • com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.ui.widget.ImageLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasClickHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsRenderable, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClickableImageLabel

    public class ImageLabel
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasClickHandlers
    Provides custom widget for adding label with image on UI. This widget provides supports for use case where label on UI needs icon along with it.

    It supports multiple icon position along the label defined by ImageLabel.ImagePosition. By default, horizontal right is the image position. The ImageLabel class is also provides handling for adding click handlers.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 19-Jun-2013
    See Also:
    Composite, $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$

    • Method Detail

      • getImageLabel

        public static ImageLabel getImageLabel(java.lang.String labelText,
                       java.lang.String iconURL,
                       java.lang.String labelTitle,
                       ImageLabel.ImagePosition imagePosition)
        Gets the instance of ImageLabel by handling all the parameters passed. All parameters passed can be NULL.

        It ensures the default positioning of image icon to the right of label horizontally. It also ensures label title is set to label text if not set explicitly.

        Parameters:
        labelText - String the label text value to be shown on UI
        iconURLCSS - String the CSS name for background image on empty label
        labelTitle - String the title of label shown on mouse hover
        imagePosition - ImageLabel.ImagePosition the position of label icon with respect to label
        Returns:
        the instance of ImageLabel with respect to parameters passed

      • setCellHorizontalAlignment

        public void setCellHorizontalAlignment(ImageLabel.ImageLabelComponent imageLabelComponent,
                              com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHorizontalAlignment.HorizontalAlignmentConstant horizontalAlignmentConstant)
        Sets the inner component like label or image or panel alignment as all are rendered as elements.

        It sets the alignment horizontally inside the horizontal or vertical panel.

        Parameters:
        imageLabelComponent - ImageLabel.ImageLabelComponent the image label inner component for which alignment needs to be set
        horizontalAlignmentConstant - HasHorizontalAlignment the type of horizontal alignment
